column2: The  only  eye  witness  to  the  incident,  5 riyalatha,  is  the  wife  of  the

column1: deceased.  On the  day  of  the  incident,  there was  a  wedding function  in  a
neighbouring house and the witness and the deceased were helping them
out.  The incident took place in the late evening. The deceased was serving
liquor to the guests at this function to which the 1st  Accused-Appellant too
was  a  guest.  The  deceased  had  served
column2: liquor  to  him  as  well.  The  1st

column1: Accused-Appellant had enjoyed himself at the function and even played a
musical instrument to entertain the guests.
